amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to submit information to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs relating to the exposure of members of the Armed Forces to airborne hazards and open burn pits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1677 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1677 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Udall to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3912-3915; text: CR S3914) To require the Secretary of Defense to submit information to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs relating to the exposure of members of the Armed Forces to airborne hazards and open burn pits.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1677 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1677 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Udall to Amendment SA 1463.
